name: Dinner Tonight: Potato Salad with Vinaigrette
description: At the farmers' market this weekend, I ran across some bright, fluorescent-hued spuds unlike any I've encountered before. Sure, I'd had red potatoes before, but for some reason I had missed red and purple potatoes that were red and purple...

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and scrub the potatoes under cold water.
Set in a big pot, and cover with cold water. Bring to a boil then reduce to simmer and cook for about 10-15 minutes.
Remove and carefully slice into 1/4-inch to 1/2-inch chips.
Add the vinaigrette while still warm. It’s good hot or cold.
